Andrew Rock

Vancouver, British Columbia

I take pieces of code which make more pieces of code which in turn make more pieces of code.

Studied at University College Cork living in Vancouver work as a frontend developer, home is everywhere and nowhere.

Employment

  • KYC AML Developer
    SMBC, New York

    My first taste of a 'real job'. Throughout this internship, I Worked with the compliance team to develop and fine tune the new "KYC" system for the Toronto office. This was my taste of web development and from here I decided to shift my focus from academics to being a developer.

    Languages used: c#, ASP.net Jquery

  • HTML Javascript Tutor
    University College Cork

    Returning to college after my time in New York I decided to tutor an introduction course to web technologies to a class of postgraduate students. As I was also relatively new it was a great opportunity to learn while teaching as we went from hello world to a simple site connected to a mySql database.

    Since graduating college and working on large scale projects, I look forward to one day being able to teach again.

    Languages used: HTML, CSS, Javascript (vanilla), PHP, mySql

  • UI Developer
    TerminalFour

    Throughout my time at TerminalFour I was responsible for developing new screens, I really enjoyed my time at TerminalFour,working in an agile environment with a small team allowed me to learn new technologies as needed.

    Languages used: HTML, CSS, jquery, Backbone

  • DeepCove Labs

    Currently working for DeepCove here in Vancouver.

    Languages used: HTML, CSS, jquery, Angular, d3 (performance charting)
